sqls.build_se_transaction_info: insert overwrite table spark_etl.se_client_info_step1 select client.id, client.client_no, client.client_name, certificate.certificate_type_name, client.certificate_number, client.sex, client.birthday, region.region_name from spark_etl.se_client_info client left join spark_etl.se_certificate_type_tbl certificate on client.certificate_type = certificate.certificate_type left join spark_etl.se_region_tbl region on client.region_code = region.region_code order by client.client_no
sqls.shield_se_transaction_info: insert overwrite table spark_etl.se_client_info_step2 select id, client_no, client_name, certificate_type_name, shield_certificate_number(certificate_type_name, certificate_number) as certificate_number, sex, shield_birthday(birthday) as birthday, region_name from spark_etl.cache_build_se_client_info where 1 = 1
